title: Abta welcomes 14 new members
text:
Abta welcomes 14 new members 29 July 2015 Save 
Abta has welcomed six new members and eight new partners in the second quarter of the year. 
Between April 1 and June 30 We Love Holidays joined as a retail member while both Select School Travel and Euroventure Travel joined as principles. 
Meanwhile 2001 Travel, Staysure Travel and Sport & Educational Travel joined as dual members. 
During the same period, The Telegraph Media Group, d-flo, C2 Software, Ernst & Young LLP, Owens Cooper Consulting, the University of Wolverhampton, Travel & General Insurance Services and the Royal Bank of Scotland have joined as partners. 
Mark Tanzer, Abta chief executive said: “We are delighted to welcome these new members and partners to Abta and I hope that they will take advantage of all Abta has to offer. We look forward to working with them.” 
Andy Cooper, chief Executive of new partner Owens Cooper Consulting, added: “Owens Cooper Consulting offers specialist advice and support to travel businesses, particularly relating to crisis management and health and safety. 
“We’re delighted to be an Abta Partner, and to be able to call on the expertise which exists within Abta, as well as having the opportunity to help and work with Abta members, both large and small”.
